role_definition: This service domain handles open item processing against accounts typically for loans. It enables a unit to handle resolution across multiple accounts as a specialized/centralized administrative activity
example_of_use: Open items are cleared against an active loan facility
executive_summary: This service domain provides a service for handling the resolution of open items against accounts (such as overdue loan payments)
key_features: Register and classify open items for processing
Report on open item resolution activity
list_of_scenarios_with_links: Process Consumer Loan Delinquency First Stage (views/view_55407.html)
